start.text: Walk softly, and carry a big gun.
They have come for our blood but they will drown in their own!
He who stands with me shall be my brother.
Today the enemy shall know fear.
Beware the alien, the mutant, and the heretic.
This day shall be a glorious one for the Imperium.

start_boss.text: Do not be daunted by its size!
Fear not the size of the enemy!

engaged.text: I fear no evil, for I am fear incarnate!
By my fury, they shall know the Emperor's name!

hull_30.text: To the last man and the last round!
I shall not die on this day!

death.text: Forgive me, Emperor... for I have failed you...

victory.text: While the enemies of the Emperor still draw breath, there can be no peace.
